name: Crash Test Dummies: Give Yourself a Hand Quiz | Music | 10 Questions

questions.text: Brad Roberts used his falsetto for the song "Keep a Lid on Things".
questions.explanation:
True.

	Roberts sang in his falsetto for several tracks, and Ellen Reid sang lead vocals for other tracks. These were two reasons that "Give Yourself a Hand" sounded very different from previous albums.

questions.text: Who sang lead vocals for "Get You in the Morning"?
questions.explanation:
Ellen Reid.

	Brad Roberts is traditionally the lead singer of the band, but this song featured backup vocalist Ellen Reid singing lead. The music video featured Ellen flipping through the television channels and watching the rest of the band perform various acts.

questions.text: Complete this lyric from "A Cigarette is All You Get": "I wanna eat my ____________".
questions.explanation:
cigarettes & cigarets.

	Another CTD song featuring cigarettes is "A Duck's Life" from "God Shuffled His Feet". The lyric for that song is as follows: "How come I smoke and smoke and smoke and curse every butt I spit out?"

questions.text: According to "Keep a Lid on Things", what shouldn't you try while the singer is gone?
questions.explanation:
Everything.

	"Keep your eye on things while I'm goneKeep a lid on things.Don't you try everything while I'm goneKeep a lid on things."

questions.text: What does the singer not have in "Just Chillin'"?
questions.explanation:
A phonebook.

	"You've got your friends in high places Babe, I can pull my own strings .You said I'm a name in a phone book, I don't have one of those things."

questions.text: In "Give Yourself a Hand", what do you need to do in order to free your hands up?
questions.explanation:
Put down the children.

	"I know you want to I know you can Put down your children And free up your hands. Come on and free up your hands.Come on and free up your hands."

questions.text: In "Get You in the Morning", how does the singer NOT want it?
questions.explanation:
Slow.

	"I want it cheap, I want it now I want it fast, and I want it with feelingI want it deep, I want a vow I want it to last, and I want it with meaning."

questions.text: In "A Little Something", why should the singer be excused?
questions.explanation:
He's very confused.

	"Could I please be excused? I'm very confused.I think I'd better have a little something.I think I'd like to have a little something."

questions.text: In "I Love Your Goo", what does the singer not say he loves?
questions.explanation:
Plasma.

	Plasma is not mentioned in the song, while the other bodily components are: "I love your guts, I love your goo.Your ugly blood, your creepy heartThe heart that's true to me and youI thank you."

questions.text: "Give Yourself a Hand" was the Dummies' last album with BMG.
questions.explanation:
True.

	The Dummies left the record label BMG after touring to promote "Give Yourself a Hand".  Since then, their record label has been Deep Fried Records.
